title: Code Assist does not respect platform line ends
description: When using Code Assist, it does not respect the platform line endings, resulting in incorrect formatting.
OB: When Code Assist is used, it fails to adjust the line endings according to the platform, causing the code to have inconsistent line endings.
EB: Code Assist should correctly adapt the line endings to match the platform, ensuring that they are in the CR/LF format as expected.
SR: To reproduce this issue, follow these steps: 1. Create a new class. 2. Add a method within the class. 3. Define a local variable for an array.
